channel.description: Resources Slides An Introduction to Linux File Permissions from DigitalOcean File Permissions from Ubuntu Enable Open as Administrator on Ubuntu 18.04 from Website for Students chmod on Just Enough Linux Linux Users and Groups on Linode Video Script In this video, we will discuss how file permissions work in Ubuntu Linux. Working with file permissions in Linux is sometimes one of the more challenging aspects of the operating system, as it is very limited compared to Windows. It requires a bit of thinking to determine how to configure your permissions, but if done correctly it can be very powerful.
